message: I'm feeling generous, let's split it 90/10, your choice!
Let's split it down the middle, a fair start!
Let's be reasonable, I'll take 60% and you get 40% - this is our last chance before the money really dwindles!
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a small share
This is my final offer, 40/60. Take it or we both lose more money! It's better to get something than nothing!
